amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funds for Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy by $50,000,000 and reduce funds for Fossil Energy Research and Development by $100,000,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funds for Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy by $50,000,000 and reduce funds for Fossil Energy Research and Development by $100,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hahn amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 139 - 245 (Roll no. 314).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Hahn amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 139 - 245 (Roll no. 314).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A012) offered by Ms. Hahn.
